mapper.select: select category_code, category_code_ref, category_name, depth from pdu_category
mapper.insert: insert into pdu_category_detail(pdu_category_code_ref, pdu_name, pdu_price, pdu_sale_price, pdu_size, pdu_color, pdu_pieces, pdu_content, pdu_classificate) values( #{pdu_category_code_ref}, #{pdu_name}, #{pdu_price}, #{pdu_sale_price}, #{pdu_size}, #{pdu_color}, #{pdu_pieces}, #{pdu_content}, #{pdu_classificate} )
